title: OpenAI-powered tweet generator
author: Gareth Roll
readme:
This workflow uses OpenAI to generate tweets to be stored in Airtable for review.

A JS snippet handles the topics to be tweeted about in the form of hashtags.

![tweetgeneratorbot.jpg](https://f000.backblazeb2.com/file/n8n-website-images/5e5c2ae863f84487ba16dd75f59c7a58.jpg)
readme_zh:
该工作流程利用OpenAI生成推文，并将其存储于Airtable中以待审核。

一段JS代码片段负责处理以话题标签形式呈现的待发布推文主题。
